Sentence.sentence: They include such measures as accountable care organizations to take charge of a patient's needs with an eye on both cost and quality, and chronic disease management to make sure the seriously ill, who are responsible for the bulk of all health care costs, are treated properly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Protecting the union demand sacrifices those students, in effect turning a blind eye to the injustice in the education system.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In  his  eyes,  however,  that  doesn't  necessarily  mean  that  innovation  has  stopped.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But an array of countries are rushing to assert greater influence here, with an eye not just towards the day those protective treaties expire, but also for the strategic and commercial opportunities that already exist.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Studies have shown, for example, that two drugs are about equally effective in treating macular degeneration, an eye disease.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But the Food and Drug Administration has not approved Avastin for use in the eye, and using it rather than the alternative, Lucentis, might carry an additional, although slight, safety risk.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Democrats and Republicans can and will take sides on a number of issues, but a more crucial concern is that both are basing major policy decisions on guesstimates rather than looking at the vast wealth of raw data with a critical eye and an open mind.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: At the end of the passage, the author suggests that decision makers view the statistics with a critical eye.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: decision makers view the statistics with a critical eye.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: That is not surprising: politicians with an eye on the next election will hardly rush to introduce unpopular measures that may not bear fruit for years, perhaps decades.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Respect is shown by looking in the general direction but avoiding direct eye contact.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: While Gail Obcamp, an American artist was giving a speech on the art of Japanese brush painting to an audience that included visitors from Japan, she was confused to see that many of her Japanese listeners have their eyes closed.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Japanese listeners sometimes closed their eyes to enhance concentration
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Why do Japanese listeners sometimes close their eyes while listening to a speech?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It was created by Ludwig Lazar Zamenhof, a Polish Jewish doctor specialized in eye diseases.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: We first see ourselves through the eyes of others, so their messages form important foundations of our self-concepts.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: George Grune, a former ad salesman who joined Reader s digest in 1960 has his eye focused on the bottom line.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The dress really caught my eye, but I did have some concerns about the length.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The eye tracker gives expert and learning performers a glimpse into what they do without thinking about it.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: There are now Barbies of one of 7 skin tones, 22 eye colors and 24 hair styles to choose from.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They include such measures as accountable care organizations to take charge of a patient's needs with an eye on both cost and quality, and chronic disease management to make sure the seriously ill, who are responsible for the bulk of all health care costs
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

list.explanation: (双方或多方)看法一致，同意某一看法

example.en: Gary and Walter see eye to eye on this question.
example.zh: 加里和沃尔特在这一问题上看法完全一致。

example.en: I cannot see eye to eye with him.

list.explanation: 令某人讨厌或烦恼的人或事物

example.en: Yeah,he's been a thumb in my eye for a tong time.
example.zh: 是啊，他早就是我的眼中钉了。

example.en: It's about time to get some shut-eye.
I've got to get some eye-shut before the exam.

word_mean: 眼：视觉器官。又称oculus 〔NA〕，眼球(bulbus oculi 〔NA〕)外形为一大球形，其前方较小球面即角膜(cornea)，由三层膜组成，即巩膜(sclera)和角膜(cornea)，脉络膜(choroid)以及视网膜(retina)，它们又各分为若干层。三层膜内为屈光介质，即房水(aqueous humor)、晶状体(crystalline lens)和玻璃体(vitreous humor)。巩膜(即外膜)为白色纤维层。在后部，视神经纤维通过筛板(lamina cribrosa)小孔进入眼球

Sentence.sentence: But Lainey took one look at it, rolled her eyes, and said, "borrring!".
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Campers, in my eyes, were people who enjoyed insect bites, ill-cooked meals, and uncomfortable sleeping bags.

Sentence.sentence: Eyeing these headwinds, plastic-bag makers are hiring scientists like stein to make the case that their products are not as bad for the planet as most people assume.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: He had wrinkles next to his eyes when he smiled, yet his smile was still as heartwarming as before, the smile of a father who just wanted a good life for his family.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: He stood by the piano, eyes closed, listening for the first time to his own work being played by someone else.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Hoping that no one would notice that I was shaking inside, I threw my voice as far as it would reach: "Put your heads on the desks and close your eyes! We are going on a journey."

Sentence.sentence: I carefully extended a long carrot, with a keen eye on those teeth, and before long, there were times I would have the groundhog sitting next to a rabbit, both munching on carrots.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I learned through another woman's eyes that my daughter was still a good person despite her troubled teenage years.

Sentence.sentence: I quickly lower myself, ducking my head to avoid looking directly into his eyes so he doesn't feel challenged.

Sentence.sentence: If I hadn't seen it with my own eyes , I wouldn't have believed it.

Sentence.sentence: In general, keep an eye on their property while they are gone.

Sentence.sentence: In the author's eyes, motorheads are cheerful and smart.

Sentence.sentence: In the wild, many cats hunt at night because their eyes are designed for low light.

Sentence.sentence: Instead, we are diurnal creatures, with eyes adapted to living in the sun's light.

Sentence.sentence: Keep eye contact in conversation to build trust.

Sentence.sentence: Meanwhile your eyes are telling you you're standing straight.

Sentence.sentence: My eyes ran across the title, Amos, the Beagle with a Plan.

Sentence.sentence: My ten-year-old was growing and changing right before my eyes, into this determined human being with a passion and a mission.

Sentence.sentence: Obediently, my class lay their heads on their desks, closed their eyes and waited.

Sentence.sentence: The book caught the author's eye because it reminded him of his own dog.

Sentence.sentence: The people in the hall seemed very nosy(爱窥探的), keeping their eyes on me with curiosity.

Sentence.sentence: There is absolutely nothing you can do while this is going on but keep both eyes fixed on the sink until it's full.

Sentence.sentence: They all share a common addiction—food that is not just spicy, but not enough to make your mouth burn, your head spin and your eyes water.

Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The teachers’ unions keep an eye on schools, the CCPOA on prisons and a variety of labor groups on health care.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: At the same time, Dickens, who had a reporter’s eye for transcribing the life around him especially anything comic or odd, submitted short sketches to obscure magazines.

Sentence.sentence: At RoMan Manufacturing, a maker of electrical transformers and welding equipment that his father cofounded in 1980, Robert Roth keep a close eye on the age of his nearly 200 workers.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: At the same time, Dickens, who had a reporter's eye for transcribing the life around him especially anything comic or odd, submitted short sketches to obscure magazines.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Biological factors behind eye contact are being investigated.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: But it can also be antagonistic such as when a political candidate tums toward their competitor during a debate and makes eye contact that signals hostility.

Sentence.sentence: Eye contact can also be aggressive.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Eye contact can be a friendly social signal.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Here's what hard science reveals about eye contact.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: If you've explored the area before, keep an eye out for familiar sights—you may be surprised how quickly identifying a distinctive rock or tree can restore your bearings.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: In a social situation, eye contact with another person can show that you are paying attention in a friendly way.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: In people who score high in a test of neuroticism, a personality dimension associated with self-consciousness and anxiety, eye contact triggered more activity associated with avoidance, according to the finnish researcher Jari hietanen and colleagues.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: It can catch someone's attention in a crowded room, "eye contact and smile" can signal availability and confidence, a common-sense notion supported in studies by psychologist Monica Moore.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Most people are not comfortable holding eye contact with strangers.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Neuroscientist Bonnie Augeung found that the hormone oxytocin increased the amount of eye contact from men toward the interviewer during a brief interview when the direction of their gaze was recorded.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Personality can affect how a person reacts to eye contact.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The teachers'unions keep an eye on schools, the CCPOA on prisons and a variety of labor groups on health care.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: This was also found in high- functioning men with some autistic spectrum symptoms, who may tend to avoid eye contact.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Too much eye contact is instinctively felt to be rude.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Trust me, eye contact is where all the magic happens.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: When you make eye contact, can feel the conversation.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: The eyes, nose and mouth are parts of the face.
sentences.cn: 眼、鼻子、嘴都是脸的组成部分。

sentences.en: He lost an eye in the war.
sentences.cn: 他在战争中失去一只眼睛。

sentences.en: They have light skin and blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 他们有白皙的皮肤和蓝色的眼睛。

sentences.en: She has sharp eyes.
sentences.cn: 她视力极好。

sentences.en: She averted her eyes from the terrible sight.
sentences.cn: 她把目光从可怕的景象上移开。

sentences.en: He has a good eye for beauty.
sentences.cn: 他对美有很好的鉴赏力。

sentences.en: To modern eyes, such doctrines appear harsh, even cruel.
sentences.cn: 从现代的角度看, 这样的教义显得苛刻, 甚至残酷。

means.word_mean: （风暴、龙卷风、飓风等）中心的平静地区；（风）眼

phrase.cizu_name: before (或 in front of, under) one's (very) eyes

jx.jx_en_mean: right in front of one (used for emphasis, especially in the context of something surprising or unpleasant)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 就在某人眼前；当某人的面（表强调，尤用于令人吃惊或不快的事）

lj.lj_ly: he saw his life's work destroyed before his very eyes.
lj.lj_ls: 他亲眼目睹自己毕生的心血毁于一旦。

lj.lj_ly: I'd never clapped eyes on the guy before.
lj.lj_ls: 我以前从未见过这小伙子。

jx.jx_en_mean: refuse to notice or acknowledge something unwelcome or unpleasant
jx.jx_cn_mean: 对于（不受欢迎或令人不快之事）视若无睹，故意忽略；不承认，不理会

lj.lj_ly: he couldn't close his eyes to the truth—he had cancer.
lj.lj_ls: 他无法回避这个事实——他患了癌症。

phrase.cizu_name: an eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth

jx.jx_en_mean: used to refer to the belief that retaliation in kind is the appropriate way to deal with an offence or crime
jx.jx_cn_mean: 以眼还眼，以牙还牙；以其人之道还治其人之身

jx.jx_en_mean: the calm region at the centre of a storm
(亦作 the wind's eye)the direction from which the wind is blowing

phrase.cizu_name: eyes front (或 left 或 right)

jx.jx_en_mean: a military command to turn the head in the particular direction stated
used to emphasize the extreme degree of someone's eager curiosity

lj.lj_ly: when I read about his arrest my eyes popped out on stalks.
lj.lj_ls: 读到他被捕的消息时我真是弹落了眼睛。

jx.jx_en_mean: a view from the position or standpoint of a —
jx.jx_cn_mean: 从…处看到的景象；…　的立场（或观点）。 参见 bird's-eye view, worm's-eye view

lj.lj_ly: a satellite's -eye view of global warming.
lj.lj_ls: 从人造卫星上观测到的全球变暖现象。。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit.)become (or remain) able to make good judgements, especially visual ones, about a task or occupation in which one is engaged
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英)对（从事的任务或工作）目测准确；眼光准确

lj.lj_ly: I've got my eye in now; I'm landing them just where I want them.
lj.lj_ls: 我现对得很准，正把它们降在我想要的地方。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)look at someone in a way that clearly indicates one's  sexual interest in them
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)（向某人）抛媚眼，送秋波，眉目传情

lj.lj_ly: this blonde was giving me the eye.
lj.lj_ls: 那位金发女郎正向我送秋波。

jx.jx_en_mean: used in reference to a slight degree of perception or attention

lj.lj_ly: he kept &B{half an eye on} the house as he worked.
lj.lj_ls: 他干着活，顺便照看一下房子。

jx.jx_en_mean: be able to recognize, appreciate, and make good judgements about
jx.jx_cn_mean: 对…独具慧眼；能辨别；能判断

lj.lj_ly: applicants should have an eye for detail.
lj.lj_ls: 申请者对细节应该独具慧眼。

entry.def: Your eyes are the parts of your body with which you see.

example.ex: I opened my eyes and looked...
example.tran: 我睁开眼睛看了看。

example.ex: Maria's eyes filled with tears.
example.tran: 玛丽亚的眼中噙满了泪水。

entry.def: If you eye someone or something in a particular way, you look at them carefully in that way.

example.ex: Sally eyed Claire with interest...
example.tran: 萨莉饶有兴趣地打量着克莱尔。

example.ex: We eyed each other thoughtfully...
example.tran: 我们若有所思地打量着对方。

entry.def: You use eye when you are talking about a person's ability to judge things or about the way in which they are considering or dealing with things.

example.ex: William was a man of discernment, with an eye for quality...
example.tran: 威廉是个有鉴赏力的人，对于品质的优劣很有眼光。

example.ex: Their chief negotiator turned his critical eye on the United States...
example.tran: 他们的首席谈判代表以批判的眼光看美国。

entry.def: An electric eye or infrared eye is a device which can recognize the presence of people or objects by detecting the light or heat coming from them.

example.ex: An infra-red eye is said to detect the movement of any animal within an angle of 110 degrees at up to 10 metres.
example.tran: 据说红外眼能够探测到110度角范围内远至10米的任何动物的活动。

entry.def: People sometimes talk about the eye of the camera when they are talking about something being filmed or photographed, or the way something appears in a photograph or film.

example.ex: I was again using the cold, unflinching eye of the camera to probe a sick society.
example.tran: 我再次通过照相机冷漠、坚定的镜头去探究这个病态的社会。

entry.def: An eye on a potato is one of the dark spots from which new stems grow.
An eye is a small metal loop which a hook fits into, as a fastening on a piece of clothing.
The eye of a needle is the small hole at one end which the thread passes through.
The eye of a storm, tornado, or hurricane is the centre of it.

example.ex: The eye of the hurricane hit Florida just south of Miami.
example.tran: 飓风的风眼袭击了佛罗里达州迈阿密正南部。

entry.def: If you say that something happens before your eyes ,in front of your eyes, or under your eyes, you are emphasizing that it happens where you can see it clearly and often implying that it is surprising or unpleasant.

example.ex: A lot of them died in front of our eyes...
example.tran: 他们中有很多人就死在我们眼前。

example.ex: We are under the eyes of both sides all the time.
example.tran: 我们一直都在双方的密切监视下。

entry.def: If you cast your eye or run your eye over something, you look at it or read it quickly.

example.ex: I would be grateful if he could cast an expert eye over it and tell me what he thought of it...
example.tran: 如果他能够以专家的眼光浏览一下，告诉我他的想法，我将非常感激。

example.ex: If you run your eye up and down these columns you will see that the value of some of them declined.
example.tran: 你把这几列上下扫视一遍，就会发现其中有些贬值了。

entry.def: If something catches your eye, you suddenly notice it.
entry.tran: 闯入眼帘；突然引起…的注意

example.ex: As she turned back, a movement across the lawn caught her eye.
example.tran: 她转过身，瞥见有个东西从草地上穿了过去。

entry.def: If you catch someone's eye, you do something to attract their attention, so that you can speak to them.

example.ex: I tried to catch Chrissie's eye to find out what she was playing at.
example.tran: 我努力吸引克丽茜的注意，想知道她在搞什么名堂。

entry.def: To clap eyes on someone or something, or set or lay eyes on them, means to see them.

example.ex: That's probably the most bare and bleak island I've ever had the misfortune to clap eyes on...
example.tran: 那可能是我不幸看到的最光秃、最荒凉的岛屿。

example.ex: What was he doing when you last set eyes on him?
example.tran: 你上次见到他时他在做什么？

entry.def: If you make eye contact with someone, you look at them at the same time as they look at you, so that you are both aware that you are looking at each other. If you avoid eye contact with someone, you deliberately do not look straight at them because you feel awkward or embarrassed.
entry.tran: 与…目光交流/躲避…的目光

example.ex: She was looking at me across the room, and we made eye contact several times...
example.tran: 她从房间的另一头看着我，我们有几次目光交汇。

example.ex: I spent a fruitless ten minutes walking up and down the high street, desperately avoiding eye contact with passers-by.
example.tran: 我在大街上一无所获来回走了10分钟，其间还要拼命地躲避路人的目光。

entry.def: If you close your eyes to something bad or if you shut your eyes to it, you ignore it.

example.ex: Most governments must simply be shutting their eyes to the problem.
example.tran: 大多数政府肯定会索性对那个问题视而不见。

entry.def: If you cry your eyes out, you cry very hard.

You say 'an eye for an eye' or 'an eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth' to refer to the idea that people should be punished according to the way in which they offended, for example if they hurt someone, they should be hurt equally badly in return.
entry.tran: 以眼还眼;以牙还牙;一报还一报

example.ex: ...a very simple punishment code based on an-eye-for-an-eye.
example.tran: 非常简单的以眼还眼的惩罚法则

entry.def: If there is something as far as the eye can see, there is a lot of it and you cannot see anything else beyond it.

example.ex: Here, massive dunes stretched in every direction as far as the eye could see...
example.tran: 在这里，巨大的沙丘向四面八方延绵不绝，一望无垠。

example.ex: There are pine trees as far as the eye can see.
example.tran: 放眼望去，除了松树还是松树。

entry.def: If you say that someone has an eye for something, you mean that they are good at noticing it or making judgments about it.

example.ex: Susan has a keen eye for detail, so each dress is beautifully finished off.
example.tran: 苏珊对细节精益求精，所以每件衣裙都做得非常漂亮。

entry.def: You use expressions such as in his eyes or to her eyes to indicate that you are reporting someone's opinion and that other people might think differently.

example.ex: The other serious problem in the eyes of the new government is communalism...
example.tran: 在新政府看来，另一个严重问题是社群主义。

example.ex: Richard Dorrington was, in their eyes, a very sensible and reliable man...
example.tran: 在他们眼中，理查德·多林顿是个非常可靠的明白人。

entry.def: If you keep your eyes open or keep an eye out for someone or something, you watch for them carefully.
entry.tran: 留意;瞪大眼睛;密切注意

example.ex: I ask the mounted patrol to keep their eyes open...
example.tran: 我让骑警瞪大眼睛。

example.ex: You and your friends keep an eye out—if there's any trouble we'll make a break for it.
example.tran: 你和你的朋友要留意——一有问题，我们就跑。

entry.def: If you tell someone to keep their eyes peeled for something, you are telling them to watch very carefully for it.
If you keep an eye on something or someone, you watch them carefully, for example to make sure that they are satisfactory or safe, or not causing trouble.

example.ex: I'm sure you will appreciate that we must keep a careful eye on all our running costs...
example.tran: 我们必须密切关注所有的运营成本，这一点我想您肯定会赞同。

example.ex: I went for a run there, keeping an eye on the children the whole time...
example.tran: 我去那里跑步，期间一直留意着孩子们。

entry.def: If you make eyes at someone, you look at them in a way which shows that you find them attractive and which is intended to get their attention.
entry.tran: 含情脉脉地看着；向…抛媚眼

entry.def: You say 'there's more to this than meets the eye' when you think a situation is not as simple as it seems to be.

example.ex: This whole business is very puzzling. There is a lot more to it than meets the eye.
example.tran: 整件事非常令人费解，远比看起来复杂。

entry.def: If something, especially something surprising or impressive, meets your eyes, you see it.
entry.tran: （尤指令人吃惊的或印象深刻的事情）映入…的眼帘，呈现在…眼前

example.ex: The first sight that met my eyes on reaching the front door was the church enveloped in flames.
example.tran: 赶到前门时，我第一眼看到的就是被大火吞没的教堂。

entry.def: If you say that all eyes are on something or that the eyes of the world are on something, you mean that everyone is paying careful attention to it and what will happen.
entry.tran: 所有目光都聚集在…上；所有人都在关注

example.ex: All eyes will be on tomorrow's vote...
example.tran: 所有目光都将聚集在明天的投票上。

example.ex: The eyes of the world were now on the police.
example.tran: 这时所有的目光都聚焦在警方。

entry.def: If someone has their eye on you, they are watching you carefully to see what you do.

example.ex: As the boat plodded into British waters and up the English Channel, Customs had their eye on her.
example.tran: 那艘船缓慢驶入英国水域，沿英吉利海峡向北时，海关一直密切关注着它。

entry.def: If you have your eye on something, you want to have it.

example.ex: ...if you're saving up for a new outfit you've had your eye on.
example.tran: 如果你在攒钱买一套你看中的新衣服

entry.def: If you say that you did something with your eyes open or with your eyes wide open, you mean that you knew about the problems and difficulties that you were likely to have.

example.ex: We want all our members to undertake this trip responsibly, with their eyes open.
example.tran: 我们希望所有成员都能够负责地开始这次旅程，做到心中有数。

entry.def: If something opens your eyes, it makes you aware that something is different from the way that you thought it was.

example.ex: Watching your child explore the world about her can open your eyes to delights long forgotten.
example.tran: 看着孩子探索她身边的世界能让你体会到早已忘记的快乐。

entry.def: If you see eye to eye with someone, you agree with them and have the same opinions and views.

example.ex: Yuriko saw eye to eye with Yul on almost every aspect of the production...
example.tran: 百合子和尤尔几乎在生产的每个方面都看法一致。

example.ex: We've never seen eye to eye.
example.tran: 我们的看法从来就没有一致过。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is at the eye of the storm, you mean they are the main subject of a public disagreement.

example.ex: The bowlers at the eye of the storm were nowhere in evidence.
example.tran: 处于风口浪尖的那些投手不见了踪影。

example.ex: ...the minister in the eye of the storm.
example.tran: 备受指责的那位部长

entry.def: When you take your eyes off the thing you have been watching or looking at, you stop looking at it.

example.ex: She took her eyes off the road to glance at me...
example.tran: 她把视线从公路上移开，扫了我一眼。

example.ex: Nina couldn't take her eyes off Philip.
example.tran: 尼娜无法将她的视线从菲利普身上移开。

entry.def: If someone sees or considers something through your eyes, they consider it in the way that you do, from your point of view.

example.ex: She tried to see things through his eyes...
example.tran: 她尽力从他的视角看问题。

example.ex: The story is told through the eyes of Inspector Simon Potter.
example.tran: 这个故事是从西蒙·波特巡官的视角讲述的。

entry.def: If you say that you are up to your eyes in something, you are emphasizing that you have a lot of it to deal with, and often that you are very busy.
entry.tran: 深陷于…中；（常指）忙得不可开交

example.ex: I am up to my eyes in work...
example.tran: 我工作忙得不可开交。

example.ex: The women are just up to their eyes in debt.
example.tran: 那些女人债台高筑。

means.word_mean: 2. good discernment (either with the eyes or as if with the eyes);

sentences.sentence: "she has an eye for fresh talent"

means.word_mean: 4. an area that is approximately central within some larger region;

sentences.sentence: "it is in the center of town"
"they ran forward into the heart of the struggle"
"they were in the eye of the storm"

means.word_mean: 5. a small hole or loop (as in a needle);

sentences.sentence: "the thread wouldn't go through the eye"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ēage, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch oog and German Auge

sentences.cn: 你把这几列上下扫视一遍，就会发现其中有些贬值了。
sentences.en: If you run your eye up and down these columns you will see that the value of some of them declined.

sentences.cn: 如果他能够以专家的眼光浏览一下，告诉我他的想法，我将非常感激。
sentences.en: I would be grateful if he could cast an expert eye over it and tell me what he thought of it...

sentences.cn: 飓风的风眼袭击了佛罗里达州迈阿密正南部。
sentences.en: The eye of the hurricane hit Florida just south of Miami.

sentences.cn: 他们中有很多人就死在我们眼前。
sentences.en: A lot of them died in front of our eyes...

sentences.cn: 我们一直都在双方的密切监视下。
sentences.en: We are under the eyes of both sides all the time.

sentences.cn: 萨莉饶有兴趣地打量着克莱尔。
sentences.en: Sally eyed Claire with interest...

sentences.cn: 我们若有所思地打量着对方。
sentences.en: We eyed each other thoughtfully...

sentences.cn: 威廉是个有鉴赏力的人，对于品质的优劣很有眼光。
sentences.en: William was a man of discernment, with an eye for quality...

sentences.cn: 他们的首席谈判代表以批判的眼光看美国。
sentences.en: Their chief negotiator turned his critical eye on the United States...

sentences.cn: 据说红外眼能够探测到110度角范围内远至10米的任何动物的活动。
sentences.en: An infra-red eye is said to detect the movement of any animal within an angle of 110 degrees at up to 10 metres.

sentences.cn: 我再次通过照相机冷漠、坚定的镜头去探究这个病态的社会。
sentences.en: I was again using the cold, unflinching eye of the camera to probe a sick society.

sentences.cn: 玛丽亚的眼中噙满了泪水。
sentences.en: Maria's eyes filled with tears.

sentences.cn: 我睁开眼睛看了看。
sentences.en: I opened my eyes and looked...

sentences.cn: 我经常走这条路，闭着眼睛都能找到。
sentences.en: I've made this trip so often, I could do it with my eyes shut.

sentences.cn: 嫌疑犯有着一头黑发和一双绿眼睛。
sentences.en: The suspect has dark hair and green eyes.

sentences.cn: 闭上 / 睁开眼睛
sentences.en: to close/open your eyes

sentences.cn: 眼睛朝下看
sentences.en: to drop/lower your eyes (= to look down)

sentences.cn: 我的眼睛里进了什么东西。
sentences.en: I have something in my eye.

sentences.cn: 蓝眼睛的金发女郎
sentences.en: a blue-eyed blonde

sentences.cn: 她一定会注意到那个破损的玻璃杯，这个女人的眼睛尖着呢。
sentences.en: She's bound to notice that chipped glass. The woman has eyes like a hawk!

sentences.cn: 我让骑警瞪大眼睛。
sentences.en: I ask the mounted patrol to keep their eyes open...

sentences.cn: 我睁开眼睛看了看。
sentences.en: I opened my eyes and looked...

sentences.cn: 享受周围世界的美好，并睁大眼睛留意面前的机会。
sentences.en: Enjoy the beauty of the world around and keep the eyes open to see the possibilities before you.

sentences.cn: 但是，如这项针对人类的研究所示，海豚睁着眼睛睡觉的另一个原因是要在睡着时留心(35) 掠食动物。
sentences.en: But, as the human study suggests, another reason for dolphins keeping their eyes open during sleep is that they can look out for 35 predators while asleep.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 就像你还需要多一个理由厌恶健身房似的，现在人们发现锻炼不仅会使你的肌肉精疲力竭，你的眼睛也会同样疲惫.
sentences.en: As if you needed another reason to hate the gym, it now turns out that exercise can exhaust not only your muscles, but also your eyes.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 研究团队发现，锻炼使快速眼球运动的速度下降了大约8%，(33) 阻碍了眼睛捕捉新的视觉信息。
sentences.en: The team found that exerciser educed the speed of rapid eye movements by about 8%, 33 preventing their ability to capture new visual information.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 研究中的狗通常会看着人类和其他狗的眼睛来感知其情绪。
sentences.en: Dogs in the study looked most at the eyes of humans and other dogs to sense their emotions.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 别指望通过一次华丽的组装就能完成整个功能机械系统.
sentences.en: Don't try to make a functioning mechanical system at once, in one glorious act of assembly.

sentences.cn: 位置靠后,且低, 恰好在眼睛所在的水平线下方.
sentences.en: Ears -- set well back and low, even with or below eye level.

sentences.cn: 他的眼睛极少闪亮.
sentences.en: His eyes seldom lit up.

sentences.cn: 只凭眼睛难择妻.
sentences.en: A wife is not to be chosen by the eye only.

sentences.cn: 他一头短短的棕色卷发和蓝色的眼睛,留着短胡须.
sentences.en: He's got shore , brown wavy hair with blue eyes and a short beard.

sentences.cn: 她有一双美丽明亮的眼睛.
sentences.en: She has beautiful and bright eyes.

sentences.cn: 因为有点近视,她有眯著眼睛看人的习惯.
sentences.en: She has a habit of seeing in narrow eyes because of short sight.

sentences.cn: 烟雾使他的眼睛充满血丝.
sentences.en: The smog made his eyes red.

sentences.cn: 暗色的眼睛,漫不经心的发型.
sentences.en: Dark eyes and careless hair.

sentences.cn: 她那两片娇艳生动的红嘴唇儿,一双天真纯洁的大眼睛,使她在容貌颜色上,平添了一段动人之处.
sentences.en: Her mobile peony mouth and large innocent eyes added eloquence to colour and shape.

sentences.cn: 刚碰到他的目光,她便把眼睛转了开去.
sentences.en: The instant she caught his eye she looked away again.

sentences.cn: 近视是视力不正常的伸长, 使远距离的物体模糊不清.
sentences.en: Myopia ( nearsightedness ) is an abnormal elongation of the eye, causing distant objects to appear blurred.

sentences.cn: 手术反应较轻,远期无不良反应,视力恢复良好.
sentences.en: The eye reaction after operation was mild and the postoperative visual acuity recovered well.

sentences.cn: 他的左眼视力不好.
sentences.en: He sees poorly with his left eye.

sentences.cn: 300多度的眼睛怎样恢复到正常视力?
sentences.en: How does many degrees 300 eye restore normal vision?

sentences.cn: 接着体重锐减25磅, 右眼失去大部分视力.
sentences.en: Then he lost 25 lbs. and most of the sight in his right eye.

sentences.cn: 以年龄而言,他的左眼视力和屈折度完全正常.
sentences.en: The left eye was entirely normal , with normal vision and refraction for his age.

sentences.cn: 雷射光凝固法可以用来治疗因脉络膜骨瘤合并黄斑部的浆液性积水所造成的视力下降.
sentences.en: Laser photocoagulation may be effective in decreasing subretinal fluid in eyes affected by choroidal osteoma.

sentences.cn: 我去检查眼睛,根据报告我视力极佳.
sentences.en: I've had my eyes tested and the report says that my vision is perfect.

sentences.cn: 可能是因为连续的潮湿气候, 阴天时眼睛就不舒服, 视力特别疲劳的感觉.
sentences.en: Maybe this caused by wet climate. Eyes feel exhausted in rainy days, very tired.

sentences.cn: 好视力眼睛能治远视和近视 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can good eyesight eye treat long sight and myopia?

sentences.cn: 青光眼和外伤是导致严重视力残疾的主要原因.
sentences.en: Glaucoma and eye trauma were two major causes leading to severe visual disability.

sentences.cn: 适应症: 白内障 、 结膜炎、视力不足 、 近视 、 老花眼、视力减退及眼部疾病.
sentences.en: Indications: Cataract, Conjunctivitis, Myopia, Presbyopia , Eye sight degeneration and other eye disease.

sentences.cn: 到明处来看书,免得搞坏了视力.
sentences.en: Read in a good light lest It'should hurt your eyes.

sentences.cn: 它们能缓解你疲劳的双眼并保护你的视力.
sentences.en: They can relax your tired eyes and keep your eyesight.

sentences.cn: 灯光太暗,对你的视力不好.
sentences.en: Dimming light won't do any good to your eyes.

sentences.cn: 为了保护视力,我们快做做眼保健操吧.
sentences.en: Let's do eye exercise to help protect our eyesight.

sentences.cn: 眼睛近视了怎么保养? 怎么恢复视力?
sentences.en: Is the eye myopic how to maintain? How to restore vision?

sentences.cn: 在视力扩大的时期, 一种病理状态开始发生.
sentences.en: At some point during the enlargement of the eye, a pathological state begins to develop.

sentences.cn: 明亮的光线影响视力.
sentences.en: Bright light affects the eyes.

sentences.cn: 做眼睛视力矫正手术需要注意哪些问题?
sentences.en: Do art of forehand of eye eyesight correct to need what to problem note?

sentences.cn: 我的眼睛检查过了,检查报告说我的视力非常好.
sentences.en: I have had my eyes tested and the report says that my vision is perfect.

sentences.cn: 三文鱼可以帮助防止黄斑变性 、 干眼 、 视力丧失和眼部疲劳.
sentences.en: Salmon can help prevent macular degeneration, dryness, loss of vision and fatigue of eyes.

sentences.cn: 结果35例病人经手术治疗和实施各项护理措施,34例(34眼)视网膜复位,视力提高.
sentences.en: Results macular hole and retinal reattachment were attained in 34 eyes by operation and nursing.

sentences.cn: 这种眼药水能改善你的视力.
sentences.en: The eye drops will help to improve your eyesight.

sentences.cn: 结果11例中有8例治愈,视力均有不同程度提高,3眼治疗无效.
sentences.en: Results The postoperative visual acuities increased in 8 eyes. 3 eyes was removed.

sentences.cn: 如果我的视力许可,我还要再写一本小说.
sentences.en: I will write another novel if my eyes permit.

sentences.cn: 结果:所有患者主导眼原在位视力均提高二行以上,视力≥0.8者达48.3%.
sentences.en: Both eyes look in the front direction without nystagmus or with slight nystagmus.

sentences.cn: 测验表明他一只眼睛视力不好.
sentences.en: The exam showed that he had poor vision in one eye.

sentences.cn: 我的眼睛近视了怎么不用药物的情况下恢复视力?
sentences.en: Is my eye myopic how need not vision restore below the circumstance of medicaments?

sentences.cn: 你在这样弱的光线下看书会损伤视力的.
sentences.en: You will strain your eyes by reading in such poor light.

sentences.cn: 他们警觉地注视着我们。
sentences.en: They eyed us with alarm.

sentences.cn: 怀疑地注视着某人
sentences.en: to eye sb suspiciously

sentences.cn: 他走上台时所有的目光都注视着他。
sentences.en: All eyes were on him (= everyone was looking at him) as he walked on to the stage.

sentences.cn: 他的眼睛永远热烈地注视着这个变幻莫测,美不胜收的世界.
sentences.en: He had his eyes always eagerly open to its infinite varieties and beauties.

sentences.cn: 她把雪白的手放在他头上, 深情地注视着他的眼睛.
sentences.en: She laid her white hand upon his head, and looked him fondly in the eyes.

sentences.cn: 他们密切注视证券交易所的每一个变化.
sentences.en: They eyed every change in the stock market.

sentences.cn: 为什么珍妮含泪注视着你?
sentences.en: Why did Jeanne gaze at you with swimming eyes?

sentences.cn: 然而我们还是要警惕地注视着马厩门.
sentences.en: But we should keep an eye on the barn door anyway.

sentences.cn: 我注视着远处的灯光.
sentences.en: My eyes fixed on a distant light.

sentences.cn: 她注视着钟.
sentences.en: She fixed her eyes on the clock.

sentences.cn: 她睁大了眼睛注视他.
sentences.en: She stared at him with wide eyes.

sentences.cn: 他当心地又把眼睛移到洞口, 注视着那团影子.
sentences.en: Putting his eye cautiously back to the hole, he stared into the shadows.

sentences.cn: 我一面听着, 一面为他说的话感到难为情, 同时眼睛注视着他额上那些深陷的皱纹.
sentences.en: I listened, smarting at his words, my eyes wincing into his surrounding wrinkles.

sentences.cn: 他注视着她.
sentences.en: He followed her with his eyes.

sentences.cn: 倘使他们要告别, 那就不能处在莱伊尔小姐那冷冷的注视之下.
sentences.en: If they had to part, it could not be under Miss Ley's cold eyes.

sentences.cn: 那只狗注视着那个陌生人.
sentences.en: The dog eyed the stranger.

sentences.cn: 我们注视着那美丽的日落.
sentences.en: Our eyes dwelt on the beautiful sunset.

sentences.cn: 雷达兵目不转睛地注视着荧光屏.
sentences.en: The radarman's eyes were glued to the screen.

sentences.cn: 与此同时, 我的目光落在杰克身上.它平静地注视着发生在它身旁的事.
sentences.en: At the same moment, my eyes fell on Jake, calmly observing everything going on around him.

sentences.cn: 所有的目光都注视着我.
sentences.en: All eyes were bent on me.

sentences.cn: 老太太始终注视着那个陌生人.
sentences.en: The old lady fastened her eyes on the stranger.

sentences.cn: 我的目光就是你窗前的星星, 每夜都在深情地注视着你.
sentences.en: My eyes are the stars over your window, Gazing affectionately at you every night.

sentences.cn: 母亲带着殷切期望的微笑注视着吉姆.
sentences.en: Mother eyed Jim with an eager, expectant smile.

sentences.cn: 他可疑地注视她.
sentences.en: His eyes rested on her doubtfully.

sentences.cn: 他如何能无动于衷的注视着这个女孩并怀念那双淡褐色的眼眸?
sentences.en: How can he see the girl And miss those hazel eyes?

sentences.cn: 她目不转睛地注视着这婴儿.
sentences.en: She never took her eyes off the baby for a moment.

sentences.cn: 一架由休斯敦控制中心控制的照相机注视着宇航员们.
sentences.en: This camera, controlled from mission control back in Houston , kept an eye on the as tronauts.

sentences.cn: 他两眼热切地注视着演讲者.
sentences.en: His eyes fastened eagerly on the speaker.

sentences.cn: 他注视着店中的骚乱.
sentences.en: He eyed the commotion in the store.

sentences.cn: 他以工程师的眼光审视这个设计。
sentences.en: He looked at the design with the eye of an engineer.

sentences.cn: 她阅读时以敏锐的目光审视语言的习惯用法.
sentences.en: She reads with a sharp eye for idiom.

sentences.cn: 她若有所思地审视它,黑色的嘴角浮起一丝残酷的微笑.
sentences.en: She eyed It'speculatively as a cruel smile appeared on her black lips.

sentences.cn: 他的眼光犀利而机警, 审视着她脸上的每一丝变化.
sentences.en: His eyes were keen and alert , watching every change in her face.

sentences.cn: 他以经济学行家的眼光审视这个问题.
sentences.en: He cast a professional economist's eyes on the problem.

sentences.cn: 我们仔细地审视了对方.
sentences.en: We eyed each other thoughtfully.

sentences.cn: 他以专业经济学家的眼光审视这个问题.
sentences.en: He cast a professional economist's eye on the problem.

sentences.cn: 他朝她淡淡一笑.她把眼睛转向一边, 害怕他会审视她的目光.
sentences.en: He smiled at her, and she looked away, afraid that he might read her eyes.

sentences.cn: 林顿停止了哭泣, 抬起他的蓝色的大眼睛审视着这位检查者.
sentences.en: Linton ceased crying, and lifted his great blue eyes to inspect the inspector.

sentences.cn: 没有人能够以神灵的眼光审视人类所关注的全部问题.
sentences.en: No one can scan the entire horizon of human concern with the eye of a god.

sentences.cn: 格洛丽亚以审视的眼光向货架上其余的衣服扫了一遍，才伸手去拿那件连衣裙。
sentences.en: Gloria slid an appraising eye over the rest of the rack before reaching for the dress.

sentences.cn: 细看一下,眼角还有一两条皱纹.
sentences.en: There was a line or two round the eyes , if you looked closely.

sentences.cn: 他以挑剔的眼光细看了几页.
sentences.en: He scrutinised the pages with a critical eye.

sentences.cn: 要仔细看,留心听.
sentences.en: We must now be all eyes and ears.

sentences.cn: 好的司机一定仔细看路.
sentences.en: A good driver keeps his eye on the road.

Sentence.sentence: When dogs looked at expressions of angry dogs, their eyes rested more on the mouth, perhaps to interpret the threatening expressions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: New research shows that dogs limit their eye contact with angry humans.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Nearby cameras tracked the dogs’ eye movements.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Dogs in the study looked most at the eyes of humans and other dogs to sense their emotions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: With a wireless setup, you stick batterypowered sensors up around your home that keep an eye on windows, doors, motion, and more.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Isn't it a bit weird that spending it should happen in half a blink ( ' ,  眨眼 ) of an eye? Doesn't a wallet—that time-honoured Friday-night feeling of pleasing, promising fatness—represent something that matters? But I'll leave the economics to the experts.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Excuses can get very elaborate: "I know I'm look at another's exam, even though I'm supposed to keep my eyes on my own paper, but that's not cheating because I'm just checking my answers, not copying.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It is easy to accept that genes control physical characteristics such as sex, race and eye color.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Respect is shown by looking in the general direction but avoiding direct eye contact.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: While Gail Obcamp, an American artist was giving a speech on the art of Japanese brush painting to an audience that included visitors from Japan, she was confused to see that many of her Japanese listeners have their eyes closed.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Japanese listeners sometimes closed their eyes to enhance concentration
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Why do Japanese listeners sometimes close their eyes while listening to a speech?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: There are many commonly held beliefs about eye glasses and eyesight that are not proven facts.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Only certain parts of the eye can be replaced
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What do we learn about eye transplanting from the talk?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It can permanently change the eye structure
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It is a major achievement in eye surgery.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: For instance, some people believe that wearing glasses too soon weakens the eyes.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But there is no evidence to show that the structure of eyes is changed by wearing glasses at a young age
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Studies show that for adults there is no danger, but children can develop loss of vision if they have glasses inappropriate for their eyes.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Too little light makes the eyes work harder, so they do get tired and strained
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Another myth about eyes is that they can be replaced, or transferred from one person to another.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It will gradually weaken the eyes of adults
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Now I have enough money to buy that piece of land I've had my eye on.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But the store manger laid the evil eye on us
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: After exercising, the scientists tested the cyclists with eye tracking cameras to see how well their brains could still control their visual system.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Cartme's creations soon captured the discriminating eye of a French diplomat, Charles Maurice de Talleyrand-Perigord.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Isn't it a bit weird that spending it should happen in half a blink of an eye?
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Somewhat nostalgically, he quotes John Maynard Keynes' justly famous words of praise to the bookstore: "One should enter it vaguely, almost in a dream, and allow what is there freely to attract and influence the eye."
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The caffeine—the equivalent of two strong cups of coffee, was sufficient to reverse this effect, with some cyclists even displaying increased eye movement speeds.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The team found that exerciser educed the speed of rapid eye movements by about 8%, preventing their ability to capture new visual information.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: with a wireless setup, you stick battery-powered sensors up around your home that keep an eye on windows, doors, motion, and more.
